languages.text: "Господин Антар держит обслугу в страхе и подвергает регулярной мучительной муштре, калечит за мелкие провинности. А офицеры... боятся с ним связываться. Они нижайше просят освободить их от вашего великого дара, которого они оказались недостойны".

"Master Anthar has the servants living in fear and regularly subjects them to torturous drills, mutilating them for minor infractions. Meanwhile, the officers... are afraid to associate with him. They humbly beg to be relieved of your magnanimous gift, of which they are unworthy."
languages.original_text: "Господин Антар держит обслугу в страхе и подвергает регулярной мучительной муштре, калечит за мелкие провинности. А офицеры... боятся с ним связываться. Они нижайше просят освободить их от вашего великого дара, которого они оказались недостойны".

traits.locale_text: "Master Anthar has the servants living in fear and subjects them to regular torture, mutilating them for minor infractions. Meanwhile, the officers... are afraid to associate with him. They humbly beg to be relieved of your magnanimous gift, of which they are unworthy."

languages.text: "Meister Anthar versetzt die Diener in Angst, unterzieht sie quälenden Übungen und verstümmelt sie wegen einfacher Vergehen. Gleichzeitig haben die Offiziere ... Angst, mit ihm zu verkehren. Sie bitten Euch daher in aller Bescheidenheit, ihnen Euer großherziges Geschenk wieder zu entziehen, dessen sie unwürdig sind."
languages.original_text: "Master Anthar has the servants living in fear and regularly subjects them to torturous drills, mutilating them for minor infractions. Meanwhile, the officers... are afraid to associate with him. They humbly beg to be relieved of your magnanimous gift, of which they are unworthy."

traits.locale_text: "Meister Anthar versetzt die Diener in Angst, unterzieht sie quälenden Übungen und verstümmelt sie wegen einfacher Vergehen. Gleichzeitig haben die Offiziere ... Angst, mit ihm zu verkehren. Sie bitten Euch daher in aller Bescheidenheit, ihnen Euer großherziges Geschenk wieder zu entziehen, dessen sie unwürdig sind."

languages.text: « Maître Anthar fait régner la terreur parmi les serviteurs et les soumet régulièrement à des exercices atroces, en les mutilant pour des infractions insignifiantes. De leur côté, les officiers... ont peur de le côtoyer. Ils vous supplient humblement de reprendre votre cadeau ô combien magnanime, dont ils ne se sentent pas dignes. »
languages.original_text: "Master Anthar has the servants living in fear and regularly subjects them to torturous drills, mutilating them for minor infractions. Meanwhile, the officers... are afraid to associate with him. They humbly beg to be relieved of your magnanimous gift, of which they are unworthy."

traits.locale_text: « Maître Anthar fait régner la terreur parmi les serviteurs et les soumet régulièrement à des exercices atroces, en les mutilant pour des infractions insignifiantes. De leur côté, les officiers... ont peur de le côtoyer. Ils vous supplient humblement de reprendre votre cadeau ô combien magnanime, dont ils ne se sentent pas dignes. »

languages.text: 「マスター・アンサールは使用人たちを恐怖の中で生活させ、些細な違反に対しても定期的に拷問や身体の損壊を加えております。一方で士官たちは……彼と関わることを恐れております。彼らはつつしんで、身に余るご厚意…つまりマスター・アンサールという贈り物を返上させていただきたく、お願い申し上げております」
languages.original_text: "Master Anthar has the servants living in fear and regularly subjects them to torturous drills, mutilating them for minor infractions. Meanwhile, the officers... are afraid to associate with him. They humbly beg to be relieved of your magnanimous gift, of which they are unworthy."

traits.locale_text: 「マスター・アンサールは使用人たちを恐怖の中で生活させ、些細な違反に対しても定期的に拷問や身体の損壊を加えております。一方で士官たちは……彼と関わることを恐れております。彼らはつつしんで、身に余るご厚意…つまりマスター・アンサールという贈り物を返上させていただきたく、お願い申し上げております」

languages.text: «El maestro Anthar tiene atemorizados a los sirvientes y a menudo los somete a simulacros espantosos, mutilándolos por la más leve carencia. Mientras tanto, los oficiales... temen verse asociados con él. Humildemente, piden que recupere su magnánimo regalo, del que son indignos».
languages.original_text: "Master Anthar has the servants living in fear and regularly subjects them to torturous drills, mutilating them for minor infractions. Meanwhile, the officers... are afraid to associate with him. They humbly beg to be relieved of your magnanimous gift, of which they are unworthy."

traits.locale_text: «El maestro Anthar tiene atemorizados a los sirvientes y a menudo los somete a simulacros espantosos, mutilándolos por la más leve carencia. Mientras tanto, los oficiales... temen verse asociados con él. Humildemente, piden que recupere su magnánimo regalo, del que son indignos».

languages.text: “由于安萨大师的行为，所有人都生活在恐惧之中。而且，安萨大师会定期对船员进行酷刑训练，仅仅由于轻微的违规行为残害他们。除此之外，那些军官……也不敢与他有任何来往。他们卑躬屈膝地请求您收回这件慷慨的礼物，声称他们配不上这份礼物。”
languages.original_text: "Master Anthar has the servants living in fear and regularly subjects them to torturous drills, mutilating them for minor infractions. Meanwhile, the officers... are afraid to associate with him. They humbly beg to be relieved of your magnanimous gift, of which they are unworthy."

traits.locale_text: “由于安萨大师的行为，所有人都生活在恐惧之中。而且，安萨大师会定期对船员进行酷刑训练，仅仅由于轻微的违规行为残害他们。除此之外，那些军官……也不敢与他有任何来往。他们卑躬屈膝地请求您收回这件慷慨的礼物，声称他们配不上这份礼物。”

languages.text: "Üsteğmen Anthar, hizmetkârları çok korkutuyor. Hepsini düzenli olarak işkenceden hâllice tatbikatlara tabi tutuyor, hatta ufak hataları yüzünden bazılarını sakat bırakmış. Bir de subaylar, onunla konuşmaktan korkuyor. Sizden tek dilekleri, layık olmadıkları yüce lütfunuzu geri almanız."
languages.original_text: "Master Anthar has the servants living in fear and regularly subjects them to torturous drills, mutilating them for minor infractions. Meanwhile, the officers... are afraid to associate with him. They humbly beg to be relieved of your magnanimous gift, of which they are unworthy."

Bir de subaylar, onunla konuşmaktan korkuyor. Sizden tek dilekleri, layık olmadıkları yüce lütfunuzu geri almanız."
